text: Me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, me izɨ kantri Judan gumazamiziba ko mɨsogh atiatim an gumazamizibar anɨng, ua bagh kantri inigh, egh Tabelɨn otarim amɨseveghtɨ an atrivimɨn ikiam.7:6 E gumazir kamɨn ziam gɨfozir puvatɨ, me kamaghɨn a dɨbori “Tabelɨn otarim.” Fofozir gumaziba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, a Sirian adarazir gumazir mam.
